creator: apache@polyglotinc.com
text:
Since URLs can be associated with SVG objects such that one
can click on them and go to that URL, the tools that produce
JPEG, PNG, etc from SVG images should generate client/server
side imagemaps as needed to simulate this functionality.
Moving this to RFE (Request For Enhancement) as this is not a bug report but an RFE.
creator: vincent.hardy@sun.com
